name: unicode
description: Unicode-aware string operations (grapheme-aware length, indexing, normalization)
author: NanoLang Team

functions.name: str_byte_length
functions.description: Get byte length of UTF-8 string (explicit, replaces ambiguous str_length)

functions.name: str_char_at
functions.description: Get Unicode codepoint at index (returns int codepoint)

functions.name: str_grapheme_at
functions.description: Get grapheme cluster at index (returns string)

functions.name: str_to_lowercase
functions.description: Convert to lowercase (Unicode-aware, handles Turkish İ/i)

functions.name: str_to_uppercase
functions.description: Convert to uppercase (Unicode-aware, handles German ß)

functions.name: str_is_ascii
functions.description: Check if string contains only ASCII (fast-path optimization)

breaking_change_details: Deprecates ambiguous str_length, adds explicit str_byte_length and str_grapheme_length
notes: Uses utf8proc library for Unicode operations
Critical for international users and emoji support
